org.platanios.learn.optimization

Enum ConjugateGradientSolver.PreconditioningMethod

  • java.lang.Object

    ConjugateGradientSolver

    public static enum ConjugateGradientSolver.PreconditioningMethod
extends java.lang.Enum<ConjugateGradientSolver.PreconditioningMethod>

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      IDENTITY
      Use the identity matrix as the preconditioner matrix.
      JACOBI
      Use a diagonal matrix, whose diagonal elements are equal to the diagonal elements of A, as the preconditioner matrix.
      SYMMETRIC_SUCCESSIVE_OVER_RELAXATION

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • IDENTITY

        public static final ConjugateGradientSolver.PreconditioningMethod IDENTITY
        Use the identity matrix as the preconditioner matrix. This gives the simple conjugate gradient method (that is, there is no preconditioning).

      • JACOBI

        public static final ConjugateGradientSolver.PreconditioningMethod JACOBI
        Use a diagonal matrix, whose diagonal elements are equal to the diagonal elements of A, as the preconditioner matrix.

      • SYMMETRIC_SUCCESSIVE_OVER_RELAXATION

        public static final ConjugateGradientSolver.PreconditioningMethod SYMMETRIC_SUCCESSIVE_OVER_RELAXATION
